name: DxpDeployTo
description: Start move DXP deploy from source environment to target environment. Like clicking on the 'Deploy To' button in PAAS. (Optimizely DXP, former Episerver DXC)
author: Ove Lartelius

inputs.name: ClientKey
inputs.label: DXP target environment ClientKey
inputs.helpMarkDown: The DXP project ClientKey. Generated in the PAAS interface.

inputs.name: ClientSecret
inputs.label: DXP target environment ClientSecret
inputs.helpMarkDown: The DXP project ClientSecret. Generated in the PAAS interface.

inputs.name: ProjectId
inputs.label: Project Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The DXP ProjectId (GUID). Look in the URL when in PAAS for your project. You will see the GUID as part of the URL.

inputs.name: SourceEnvironment
inputs.label: Source environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: The environment that you you want to deploy from.

inputs.name: TargetEnvironment
inputs.label: Target environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: The environment that you you want to start the deploy to.

inputs.name: SourceApp
inputs.label: SourceApp
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of application that should be deployed.

inputs.name: UseMaintenancePage
inputs.label: Use maintenance page
inputs.helpMarkDown: If maintenance page should be used during deployment.

inputs.name: IncludeBlob
inputs.label: Include BLOB
inputs.helpMarkDown: If BLOBs should be copied from source environment to the target environment.

inputs.name: IncludeDb
inputs.label: Include DB
inputs.helpMarkDown: If DBs should be copied from source environment to the target environment.

inputs.name: ZeroDowntimeMode
inputs.label: Zero Downtime Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of smooth deployment you want to use. [More information about zero downtime mode](https://world.optimizely.com/documentation/developer-guides/digital-experience-platform/deploying/deployment-process/smooth-deploy/)

inputs.name: ErrorActionPreference
inputs.label: ErrorActionPreference
inputs.helpMarkDown: Prepends the line `$ErrorActionPreference = 'VALUE'` at the top of your script.
